Articles.Content: WOW, except for the little green men it's just like the movie! Hope someone does a water planet with giant waves...

Hope someone does a water planet with giant waves...

Making a water planet it easy! It's the waves that's difficult.
Hey I got the movie. Just a little thing to add for the Ranger. On the back RCS ports, there is a bottom thruster that shoots outward of the back for slowing down for docking and such.

Guys i just realized something...

when they launched the ranger with the S5, it's not just 1 ranger but 2...

notice how both of the docking ports are empty?

theres 2 rangers!

they use an adapter of some sort to keep them together and dock at the same time
Great, great mod.

Guys i just realized something...

when they launched the ranger with the S5, it's not just 1 ranger but 2...

notice how both of the docking ports are empty?

http://i.imgur.com/Tp6lHuL.png

theres 2 rangers!

http://i.imgur.com/Y3Cy40R.png

they use an adapter of some sort to keep them together and dock at the same time

http://i.imgur.com/8PsoA8g.png

I didn't even notice that!

- - - Updated - - -

took some pics, spoilers!

http://imgur.com/a/zcZ9g

Can't wait for the Blu-Ray release!

I can finally watch it when im going on a road trip to Wisconsin!

Thanks for the screenshots for the detach scene!

So far, how much progress has been made?

I guess this is a slight "flaw" (not really) but on the Lander model we have now, the engines are sticking out a bit too far out and they are high up. Here is a screenshot of the Lander from the movie. Also the back two thruster blocks are a bit bigger than the front. Sorry for the low res
This photo should be a bit higher quality, judging by the fact that I got the movie in HD.
